headline: Assessing DuPont De Nemours (DD) Valuation As PFAS Class-Action Lawsuit Advances In Federal Court
summary: DuPont de Nemours (DD) is back in focus after a Montana federal judge denied motions to dismiss a class-action lawsuit over PFAS in firefighter turnout gear, keeping key RICO and state-law claims alive. See our latest analysis for DuPont de Nemours. At a share price of $43.39, DuPont de Nemours has a 1 month share price return of 7.27%, while the 1 year total shareholder return is 38.25%. This recent momentum contrasts with a 90 day share price return decline of 45.47% as investors weigh...
